com.eurosonic.eurosonicut

Interface IEurosonicUTPRSettings


  • public interface IEurosonicUTPRSettings
    Interface to control ultrasonic Pulser/Receiver unit

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Setup Pulser/Receiver mapping with multiplexed system

    • Method Detail

      • setMUX

        void setMUX(short ch,
          int transmitter,
          int receiver)
        Setup Pulser/Receiver mapping with multiplexed system
        Parameters:
        ch - Channel number of the UT card (unused=0)
        transmitter - Number of the transmitter from UT system channel
        receiver - Number of the receiver from UT system channel

      • setPRMode

        void setPRMode(short ch,
             int mode)
        Setup Pulser/Receiver mode (Not working with multiplexed system)
        Parameters:
        ch - Channel number of the UT card (unused=0)
        mode - Emission mode - 0 : P/R (reflexion mode) - 1 : T/T (transmission mode)

      • setPulseDelay

        void setPulseDelay(short ch,
                 float delay)
        Setup pulse delay
        Parameters:
        ch - Channel number of the UT card (unused=0)
        delay - Pulse delay µs

      • setPulseEnable

        void setPulseEnable(short ch,
                  boolean value)
        Setup pulse activation
        Parameters:
        ch - Channel number of the UT card (unused=0)
        value - Pulse activation (default=true)

      • setPulseFrequency

        void setPulseFrequency(short ch,
                     float width,
                     int mode)
        Setup pulse frequency
        Parameters:
        ch - Channel number of the UT card (unused=0)
        width - Pulse width MHz or ns
        mode - Base unit of the pulse width - 0 : quarter of a period (MHz) - 1 : half of a period (MHz) - 2 : full period (MHz) - 3 : width (ns)

      • setPulseRepetitionFrequency

        void setPulseRepetitionFrequency(short ch,
                               float prf)
        Setup PRF (Pulse Repetition Frequency)
        Parameters:
        ch - Channel number of the UT card (unused=0)
        prf - Period of pulse repetition µs

      • setPulseTimeBaseDelay

        void setPulseTimeBaseDelay(short ch,
                         float timeBase)
        Setup pulse timebase delay
        Parameters:
        ch - Channel number of the UT card (unused=0)
        timeBase - Pulse timebase delay µs

      • setPulseVoltage

        void setPulseVoltage(short ch,
                   float voltage)
        Setup pulse voltage
        Parameters:
        ch - Channel number of the UT card (unused=0)
        voltage - Voltage value V
